column2:
"<%me>...
I don't suppose you are planning to
get any rest, right?"

"I'm going to monitor you
wholeheartedly until I can copy all your
abilities through these eyes of mine!"

"I plan to continue sticking to you to
train as ARKS and I'm serious this time! "

"Although I was also serious up till
now..."

"<%me>……
おたくにはもう足を向けて
寝られねーな。"

"脇目もふらずにモニターして
おたくのすべてをこの目で
盗ませてもらうぜ！"

"オレ、まだまだおたくと一緒に
アークスで頑張りてーし
今回はマジだからな！"
"いや今までもマジだったけどよ……"
